title: Research
description: Explore the scope of integrative medicine research being conducted at Northwestern University.
cleaned_text: Research Areas of Research Our Partners We partner in our research with a number of community-based organizations and with Northwestern University's broad research network; learn more about our many collaborations. Research Resources [Selected Publications](selected-publications.html) See a curated list of recent publications from our members. [Research Map](research-map.html) Use our interactive map tool to see the scope of integrative medicine research being conducted at Northwestern. [Resources](../resources/index.html) See a list of resources curated by our members as an introduction into integrative medicine. Research Initiatives Research Conference The Osher Center for Integrative Health at Northwestern University hosts a biannual Integrative Medicine Research Conference at Northwestern Memorial Hospital.
